plain: Most likely, the user likes action, drama, and comedy movies. The user also likes movies with a variety of plots, but tends to enjoy movies with a strong story. The user also likes movies with a variety of musical scores, but tends to enjoy movies with an epic or dramatic score. The user also likes movies with a variety of settings, but tends to enjoy movies set in modern times or historical times. The user also likes movies with a variety of visual styles, but tends to enjoy movies with a realistic or fantasy visual style. The user also likes movies with a variety of writing styles, but tends to enjoy movies with a realistic or humorous writing style. The user also likes movies with a variety of runtimes, but tends to enjoy movies with a runtime of 2-3 hours. The user also likes movies with a variety of themes, but tends to enjoy movies with themes of adventure, romance, or tragedy.
